text: You could put it on a car for businesses or self employed people to advertise. A realtor could add a house address or a hairdresser or restaurant could put a daily special or coupon code.

Above the stove to help when making new recipes
You could put it on your car windows to make them darker or lighter for privacy, that would also help with sun glare, you could touch the spot where the sun is shining in your eyes.
Touchscreen on the outside of a refrigerator that automatically keeps track of contents and alerts people in the home when something is close to running out.

touchscreen menu in restaurants to show details on items

concepts.text: measure the speed of the punch and power

text: I would place the coating on a boxing heavy bag. It would measure the speed of the punch and power of it as well. It would count the number of punches as well. It would give feedback in order to perfect your technique.
old picture frames coated in this material would become smart photo frames
A coating on flooring to allow for customizable and possibly interactive floor images that would be fun for others to play with.
Use the coating on medicine bottles to have all the information about the medication and dosing.
Create a personal shopper for family and friends that would list sizes, favorite colors and personal preferences in items.
It can be sprayed on roads where people speed . That way when they rollover that part of the road it will give them a feedback of how fast they are going and to drive slower
A touch screen water bottle, that reminds you to drink more, and shows weather forecast, also showing current water level and water temperature.

You could make an entire car interior touch display, like if you want to move the seat backs it uses touch or if you want open the doors or the hatch it works with touch . Everything in the car will be a touch display even the pedals
This could be used on gym equipment to instantly change the weight being used.
Paint a large board to use as an outdoor theater
It could be used on desks instead of monitors.
Coat some on a computer and it will tell you the specs of the machine like its graphics, cpu and ram
A fully transparent keyboard that can be used to do anything.
Coat glasses with it - can darken to become sunglasses, add messages to be displayed to personalize.
Earbud and headphone cables that respond to hand gestures for volume control and switching songs.
a touch screen on the dryer to see if the clothes are done before the buzzer goes off
Pet collars that can be used as smart devices for GPS location and identifying information.
I would paint the dash of a car so you can navigate on a trip
Use it to make a universal remote control, spray it wherever you want and you have a remote.
A closet door that cycles through your current outfits and suggests new ones based on what you already have. It would help you pick out an appropriate outfit as well as style new choices.
Spread it on a canvas, or on a painting, and use the touchscreen to change what painting is displayed.

A bathroom mirror that allows you to scroll through the news, see the weather, and make or see appointments for that day.
Use it on room decoration tattoo it make very gorgeous look.

a touch screen oven

Being able to have entertainment while showering or bathing to do anything like watching shows or playing games.

not_wrong.text: who or what is on the other side

text: Doors could be coated with it that wold allow information to be displayed about who or what is on the other side.

place the material on cups and it will tell exactly what ingredients are in it and calories. it will also tell the person the temperature of the fluid and if the liquid contains any sort of drugs or poison.

text: a screen on a window or wall that shows what the outside temperature is

replacement windows that utilize touch display, allows kids to write notes or decorate for the holidays

a touchscreen on beer bottles to show if any drugs or sedatives have been added.

Put it on your fingernails and to change the color whenever you want
Using it to turn your fingers into a paintbrush to create art.
coat your car and choose its color whenever you want

Use on my bed so that I can use my phone on my bed.
